Angrypower.NAME: Rage
DESCRIPTIONS: 9 stack at most, gain #b
Showtime and [R], lose #b1 stack per turn.
9 stack at most, gain #b
Showtime and [R].

showtime.NAME: Showtime
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
#yBlock, resets at the end of your turn. When receiving Attack damage, reduce Showtime by #b1.
Gain #b
#yBlock. When receiving Attack damage, reduce Showtime by #b1.

Catastrophepower.NAME: Calamity
DESCRIPTIONS: Energy used on powerful Pandora attacks, up to 9 stacks. 10% chance to gain Showtime using Firearms attack cards for every stack of Calamity.

CoyoteApower.NAME: Coyote-A
DESCRIPTIONS: 40% chance to gain 1 Showtime and 1 Calamity when using related attack cards. Add 1 Fireworks to your hand for every 4 stacks of Showtime gained when you have Gunslinger style active.

Devilpower.NAME: Devil Trigger
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal 3 Hp every #b3 attacks. At 7 stacks of Showtime, gain 7 strength for 1 turn, up to 5 times. At the end of effect, lose 18 strength.

Dimensionpower.NAME: DimensionFissure
DESCRIPTIONS: Consumed by Sheathing, lose 1 per turn.

EbonyIvorypower.NAME: Ebony&Ivory
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal additional 3 damage when using related attack cards with 50% chance to gain 1 Calamity. Add 1 Rainstorm to your hand for every 3 stacks of Showtime gained when you have Gunslinger style active.

Endlessswordpower.NAME: EndlessSword
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, deal #b
#ydamage to the attacker, up to 15 stacks.

Endlessswordpower2.NAME: EndlessSword
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b
#ydamage to the enemy at the start of enemy's turn, reset to 0 after that. Up to 15 stacks.
Deal #b
#ydamage to the enemy at the start of enemy's turn, reset to 0 after that. Up to 15 stacks.

Flex1.NAME: Flex
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b
#yStrength after playing an attack card.

Flex2.NAME: Flex
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b
#yStrength at the end of your turn.

Gilgameshpower.NAME: Gilgamesh
DESCRIPTIONS: Improves related cards, add 1 Real Impact into your hand for every 4 stack of Showtime gained when you have SwordMaster style active. Lose 5 strength when removed.

Goldorbpower.NAME: Gold Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).

Greenorbpower.NAME: Green Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal 1-10 HP after killing this enemy.

Gunslingerpower.NAME: Gunslinger
DESCRIPTIONS: All Firearms attack cards that are not colorless cost 0 this turn. NL Gain 1 Showtime and 1 Calamity for every Firearms attack card you play.

Honeycombofirepower.NAME: Honeycombo Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: 20% chance your Firearms attack cards will be played twice, chance raises to 50% with Ebony&Ivory.

Luciferpower.NAME: Lucifer
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Showtime every time you play a related card. Add 1 PIN-UP to your hand for every 4 stacks of Showtime gained when you have Swordmaster style active.

Luciferpower2.NAME: Lucifer
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Showtime every time you play a related card. Add 1 PIN-UP and 1 Climax to your hand for every 4 stacks of Showtime gained when you have Swordmaster style active.

Pandorapower.NAME: Pandora
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 1 random colorless Firearms attack card into your hand at the start of your turn and for every 4 stacks of Showtime gained when you have Gunslinger style active. 80% chance to gain 1 Calamity for every Firearms attack card you play.

Pandorapower2.NAME: Pandora
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 2 random colorless Firearms attack card into your hand at the start of your turn and for every 4 stacks of Showtime gained when you have Gunslinger on you. 80% chance to gain 1 Calamity for every Firearms attack card you play.

Rebellionpower.NAME: Rebellion
DESCRIPTIONS: Improves related cards. Million Stab deals 2 more damage. Add 1 Over Drive to you hand for every 3 stacks of Showtime gained when you have Swordmaster style active.

Rebellionpower2.NAME: Rebellion
DESCRIPTIONS: Improves related cards. Million Stab deals 2 more damage. Add 1 Over Drive to you hand for every 3 stacks of Showtime gained when you have Swordmaster style active. Lose 2 strength when removed.

Redorbpower.NAME: Red Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1-100 coins after killing this enemy.

Royalguardpower.NAME: Royal Guard
DESCRIPTIONS: 50% chance to block incoming damage, gain 1 Rage when attacked. If you have 3 or more Rage, add 1 Release to your hand at the start of your next turn.

Royalguardpower2.NAME: Royal Guard
DESCRIPTIONS: 50% chance to block incoming damage, gain 1 Rage when attacked. If you have 3 or more Rage, add 1 Release to your hand at the start of your next turn. If you have 6 or more Rage, add 1 Royal Release to your hand at the start of your next turn.

Skystarpower.NAME: Sky Star
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Style, Showtime and Rage doesn't reset at the end of your turn. At 7 stacks of Showtime, gain 1 Sky Star, up to 3 times in one turn.

SSSpower.NAME: Style Score System Ver.1
DESCRIPTIONS: Have triggered #b
times this turn.
Have triggered #b
times this turn.

Swordmasterpower.NAME: Swordmaster
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next melee attack will be played twice. Triggering style scoring system will turn Flex into Strength.

Weaponreturnpower.NAME: Weapon Return
DESCRIPTIONS: When a Weapon is removed from play, add the same unupgraded weapon card to your draw pile (excluding Yamato).

Weaponreturnpower2.NAME: Weapon Return
DESCRIPTIONS: When a Weapon is removed from play, add the same upgraded weapon card to your draw pile (excluding Yamato).

Whiteorbpower.NAME: White Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1-3 [R] after killing this enemy.

XuanyunPower.NAME: Stun
DESCRIPTIONS: Make the enemy incapable of action.

Yamatopower.NAME: Yamato
DESCRIPTIONS: Lasts 1 turn. NL When you gain 4 or more Showtime, add 1 random colorless Melee attack card to your hand. Add 1 Sheathing and remove Yamato at the start of your next turn.
